attributes.action: include Stephen Fry, actor, comedian, writer, director, all round good egg, in the Queen's Honours List.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stephen Fry has contributed vastly to the country's cultural richness for many years. A latter-day Renaissance man, he has made us all laugh, cry, and think with little recognition. In this, his fiftieth year, official approbation would be a fitting thank you from the nation.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "include Stephen Fry, actor, comedian, writer, director, all round good egg, in the Queen's Honours List."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17262


Prime Minister's Office
